demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="center">默认效果</view>
    <gov-grid
        list="{{listThree}}">
    </gov-grid>
    <view class="center">一行三列</view>
    <gov-grid
        list="{{listOne}}"
        border-radius="3"
        has-border="{{false}}"
        column-num="3"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-grid>
    <view class="center">两行三列</view>
    <gov-grid
        list="{{listTwo}}"
        column-num="3"
        border-radius="25"
        has-hover="{{false}}"
        binditemclick="onItemClick">
    </gov-grid>
    <view class="center">一行四列</view>
    <gov-grid
        list="{{listThree}}"
        column-num="4"
        has-line="{{false}}"
        border-radius="50"
        binditemclick="bindItemClick">
    </gov-grid>
    <view class="center">一行五列</view>
    <gov-grid
        list="{{listFour}}"
        column-num="5"
        has-hover="{{false}}">
    </gov-grid>
</view>

attributes.name: has-line
attributes.description: 是否有竖分隔线，默认有

attributes.name: binditemclick
attributes.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件

events.name: itemclick
events.description: 点击宫格每一项的事件, 可以通过e事件对象, e.detail.index获取到每一项的索引值

externalClasses.name: gov-grid-item
externalClasses.description: 整体宫格外层的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如内边距

externalClasses.name: gov-inner-grid-item
externalClasses.description: （图片+标题）的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变其的样式，如背景色

externalClasses.name: gov-title
externalClasses.description: 标题title的扩展样式类，可以通过此class改变其外层的样式，如设置字大小：font-size: 60px

externalClasses.name: gov-desc
externalClasses.description: 副标题desc的扩展样式，可通过此class改变其外部的样式
